name: Casita Truchas

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I did a lot of research looking for the perfect mountainview rental with a hottub anywhere in New Mexico (our only two real requirements) and was so thrilled when I found Casita Truchas, since it was all that we wanted and more. When we got to the Casita, it was even better than the reviews and the pictures had said it would be.
reviews.title: Amazing mountaintop retrreat -- can't wait to go back!

reviews.text: No detail was overlooked. Steve was a great host. The place was spotless, and had nice touches like soft towels and wonderfully fragrant lavender bath gel.
reviews.title: Fabulous Location, Well Serviced Accomodation

reviews.text: The town of Arroyo Seco is a real treat. It has a handful of very nice pottery/photography/souvenir shops and was well worth a visit.
reviews.title: What a beautiful, peaceful place with outstanding service!

reviews.text: I cannot wait to go back for another visit!
reviews.title: used to be great

aka: Casita Truchas Arroyo Seco, Taos County, NM
